TEXT.TITLE: NUTMEG <NUTM> IN NHL LICENSING AGREEMENT
TEXT.BODY: Nutmeg Industries Inc said it has agreed in principle with Licensing Co of America on a license to sell "upscale spectator sportswear" for men, women and children bearing the logos of all 21 National Hockey League clubs. It said the agreement would take effect April One and run through June 1988. Reuter
